response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute immensely to your success. The product is valued at $1,000,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality, innovation, and potential impact on your business.

To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering the product at an exceptional price of $950,000. This offer represents a remarkable value proposition, allowing you to acquire a high-impact asset at a competitive advantage.

Please consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
